column4: OK: I have an ntfs partition now, and I want to install windows on it, using the Windows restore discs that came with the laptop. Any advice/links to a good guide?
1) make backups (I've had to restore from a backup after windows wiped a drive for me) 2) You'll have to restore grub after you instal (see ubotu)
